summary: An ordinance relating to the franchise granted to the Pacific Coast Railroad (formerly Columbia & Puget Sound Railroad Company) and the Northern Pacific Railway Company (formerly Northern Pacific & Puget Sound Shore Railorad Company), their successors and assigns, by Ordinance No. 3918; amending said ordinance to provide for changes in the franchise right of way occasioned by the construction and maintenance of the Alaskan Way Viaduct Extension; specifically amending Section 1 thereof with a view to providing such changes.
